decision_conditions: Det affect the health and appearance
description: 1x Sycamore (applicants ref T4) - Crown lift to 5 metres and thin 20%. Standing in group G4 of Tree Preservation Order 2 x Chestnut (applicants ref T5, T13) - Reduce to previous reduction points. T4 and standing in group G4 of Tree Preservation Order 1 x Lime (applicants ref T11) - Crown lift to 4m and reduce to previous reduction points. T2 of Tree Preservation Order1 x Variegated Holly (applicants ref G12) - Reduce to 2m in height. T3 of Tree Preservation Order 1 x Lime (applicants ref T19) - Crown thin 20% and lift to 3m. T6 of Tree Preservation Order 1 x Ash (applicants ref T41) - Reduce crown by 3m. T11 of Tree Preservation Order(4 x Sycamore (applicants ref T63, T64, T75, T76) - Remove dead wood and ivy. Standing in groups G2 and G9 of Tree Preservation Order)1 x Lime (applicants ref T67) - Crown lift to 5m. Standing in group G1 of Tree Preservation Order
